#labels Phase-Requirements
User stories for the Whisper IM project

=Week 1=

  1. User can chat securely without error messages
  2. User can set status to "Away"
  3. User becomes idle after set amount of inactivity
  4. User can share public key information with other users
  5. User can enable/disable logging
  6. User can block/unblock another user
  7. User will see updated buddy list when other users sign in or out
  8. User is displayed account setup screen when starting program for first time
  9. User can initiate talk with anyone regardless of "buddy" status
  10. User can select "New IM" and be displayed a new window without selecting a buddy
